channel.title: ThinkShout
channel.description: ThinkShout - We provide web strategy and open source technology to forward-thinking organizations.

item.title: Portland Drupal Business Summit: Leverage the Power of Open Source to Open Doors
item.description:
ThinkShout is excited to be organizing the first ever Portland Drupal Business Summit in partnership with MetalToad, OpenSourcery, SuperStar Media, Liveaxle, and the Technology Association of Oregon. We have an exciting line up of speakers including keynote speaker Kevin Colligan, the head of digital media for the GRAMMY Awards.

After Kevin’s keynote, we will be hosting intimate discussion with Mercy Corps, Portland State University, Tektronix and InFocus to learn more about their challenges and successes in implementing Drupal at their organization. And definitely don’t forget to stick around for cocktails!

If you are interested in learning more about Drupal and how you can use it to create the best possible digital experience for your organization, then join us on January 25 at the Nines in the Pearl District.

Tickets are limited, so get registered today!
